title: Fractions Quiz
subject: Mathematics
description: Test your understanding of fractions including basic concepts, equivalent fractions, and operations

questions.question: What is 1/2 + 1/4?
questions.explanation: To add fractions with the same denominator, add the numerators: 1/2 + 1/4 = 2/4 + 1/4 = 3/4

questions.question: Which fraction is equivalent to 2/3?
questions.explanation: 2/3 is equivalent to 4/6 because both fractions represent the same value (multiply numerator and denominator by 2)

questions.question: What is 3/4 - 1/4?
questions.explanation: When subtracting fractions with the same denominator, subtract the numerators: 3/4 - 1/4 = 2/4

questions.question: If a pizza is cut into 8 equal slices and you eat 3 slices, what fraction of the pizza did you eat?
questions.explanation: You ate 3 out of 8 equal slices, so you ate 3/8 of the pizza

questions.question: Which fraction is greater: 2/5 or 3/8?
questions.explanation: 2/5 = 0.4 and 3/8 = 0.375, so 2/5 is greater. To compare fractions, find a common denominator or convert to decimals.
